title: Boards profile not synced?
body: Every time I try to reply to a post or anything it says I need to be level 7 but I’m level 64 in game? I tried the syncing tool but it didn’t work

replies.body: Sometimes you just need to manually push through a sync with the board's side of things! Posting here in H&S like you did will do the trick, but you can also use the [**Profile Syncing Tool**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) at the top as well!
I see you as level 64. Sometimes if a slap on the wrist doesn’t work you just have to give it a kick in the ass by posting here :P
